hero.title: Empowering Businesses Through Technology
hero.subtitle: Advance Services and Solutions
hero.description: Advance Services and Solutions is your trusted partner in leveraging AI/ML, Data Analytics, Web Development, UI/UX, DevOps, and Cloud to drive innovation and business growth. Explore our Fintech solutions like AWRAG Insights and TokenSage to discover how we are shaping the future of technology.

about.welcome: Welcome to Advance Services and Solutions
about.description_part_1: At Advance Services and Solutions, we specialize in delivering transformative IT services that empower businesses to excel in today’s fast-paced, technology-driven world. From
about.description_part_2: . Our team of experts is dedicated to driving efficiency, innovation, and growth.

who_we_are.title: Who We Are?
who_we_are.description: We are a team of experienced professionals passionate about using technology to solve complex business challenges. Our mission is to offer comprehensive IT services and solutions tailored to the needs of modern businesses. With deep expertise in
who_we_are.bold_parts: AI/ML NLP Data Analytics Web Development UI/UX Design DevOps Cloud Infrastructure
who_we_are.additional_description: We also specialize in Fintech, developing advanced platforms like
who_we_are.final_description: to help businesses harness the power of data and blockchain.

still_have_question.title: Still Have Questions?
still_have_question.subtitle: Can’t find the answer you’re looking for? Please chat to our friendly team.

service.title: Our services
service.subtitle: , we offer a diverse range of services designed to enhance your business operations and technological capabilities.

card_1.title: AI/ML & NLP Solutions
card_1.subtitle: Drive innovation with machine learning, artificial intelligence, and natural language processing technologies.

card_2.title: Data Analytics
card_2.subtitle: Turn complex datasets into actionable insights to guide decision-making and strategic planning.

card_3.title: Web Development
card_3.subtitle: Build dynamic, responsive, and secure web applications to elevate your online presence.

card_4.title: UI/UX Design
card_4.subtitle: Craft intuitive, engaging, and visually compelling digital experiences.

card_5.title: DevOps & Cloud
card_5.subtitle: Accelerate development, automate deployments, and manage scalable cloud infrastructures.

ourWork.title: Our work
ourWork.mainTitle: Explore some of our most beloved projects
ourWork.subtitle: We have witnessed our partners, ranging from established corporations to start-ups preparing to launch, achieve significant success. We are enthusiastic about seeing you thrive as well.

project_1.title: AWRAG Insights
project_1.description: A financial data aggregation platform that brings real-time insights and storytelling to help businesses make informed decisions. It pulls data from trusted sources like Bloomberg, Refinitiv, S&P, and more.

project_2.title: TokenSage
project_2.description: A white-label Securities Token Offering (STO) platform that helps businesses tokenize their assets and raise capital. TokenSage provides a seamless and secure experience for launching and managing STOs
